```{r}

scplot(exampleAB_add) |> 
  set_dataline("depression") |> 
  add_statline("trend") |> 
  add_statline("trend",variable = "depression") |> 
  add_legend()
```

```{r}
fit <- mplm(exampleAB_add, dvar = c("wellbeing", "depression"))
fit
```

```{r}
print(fit, std = TRUE)
```
